question: Identify trends in IT spending among companies in the technology sector over the last five years.

subtasks.task: Aggregate IT budgets of companies classified under the technology sector over the last five years.
Correlate IT budget changes with industry-specific IT trends such as digital transformation and automation initiatives.
Analyze revenue and market capitalization data to assess the financial impact of IT spending on technology companies.
Compile findings into a report highlighting the trends in IT spending and their effects on company performance.
